On 10/10/06, Michael Giroux <mlgiroux@...> wrote:
> On 10/10/06, Bradley, Todd <todd.bradley@...> wrote:
>  > I use parameterized test cases every day in JUnit 3.8.
>
>  Perhaps I'm looking at the wrong docs.  I did the google search as
>  described in a previous reply and landed on some junit 4.0 docs that
>  describe new test annotations for parameterized testing.  I've gone
>  through Junit 3.8 docs a couple of times and do not see anything about
>  parameterized TestCase.
>
>  A specific link will be appreciated.

Not a link but _Recipe 4.8_ of J.B. Rainsberger's "JUnit Recipes"
describes the parameterized test case pattern using JUnit 3.8.

-Lasse-
